item.title: How Web Scraping Works
item.description: There are Basically 4 steps in web scraping : Send Request Get Response Select Data Extract Data ![[image/How Web Scraping Works.png]] When you send a request to a website URL, you receive a HTML Response. For Selecting data, you can use CSS selectors and XPath.

item.title: Scrapy Installation
item.description: For Windows # Setup Virtual env. Manually Setup in pycharm if s1 and 3 done pip install Scrapy To Create a env # open your terminal Use cmd python -m venv .\venv(current destination) Visual Build Tools - https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/downloads/ if any error, use c++ from above For Fedora #

item.description: Scrapy is a frame which make are work of web scraping easy.

item.title: What is Web Scraping ?
item.description: Web Scraping Simply is Extracting Data from a website for Various needs. Web Scraping, is also like a method of developing tools for efficiently extracting data from the website.
